title: Diamond Vanki Pendant - A Timeless Touch of Elegance
materials: 18K Rose Gold with Brilliant Cut Diamonds. Diamonds are VVS clarity and E-F color. Features a high Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This exquisite pendant is a modern interpretation of the classic Vanki. The design showcases a graceful crescent shape, adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut diamonds in a pave setting. The leaf motifs on the ends add a touch of nature-inspired elegance. Contemporary design ensures versatility for both traditional and modern attire.
colors: Predominantly rose gold with the brilliant sparkle of white diamonds.
occasions: Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any occasion
from family gatherings and festivals (like Sankranthi or Ugadi) to modern parties and celebrations. A beautiful addition to bridal jewellery
ideal for a reception or sangeet.
description: This Diamond Vanki Pendant offers a stunning blend of contemporary design and timeless elegance. The exceptional craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds, and durable rose gold construction ensure lasting beauty. A versatile piece that complements both traditional South Indian sarees and Western attire. Represents modern luxury with a nod to cultural heritage.
